description: Deletes the specified organization conformance pack and all of the Config rules and remediation actions from all member accounts in that organization. Only a management account or a delegated administrator account can delete an organization conformance pack. When calling this API with a delegated administrator, you must ensure Organizations ListDelegatedAdministrator permissions are added. Config sets the state of a conformance pack to DELETE_IN_PROGRESS until the deletion is complete. You cannot update a conformance pack while it is in this state.

parameters.name: OrganizationConformancePackName
parameters.description: The name of organization conformance pack that you want to delete.
